~*~ The End ~*~

[Kara]64-simon opened [her]64-simon eyes slowly , blinking several times to clear [her]64-simon blurred vision , and feeling like [her]64-simon head was in a vise . Temporarily disoriented , [she]64-simon lifted [her]64-simon hand to [her]64-simon head , poking at it experimentally , only to feel [her]64-simon forehead wrapped with gauze . What the hell ? [Her]64-simon memory returned slowly , trickling back in bits and pieces . [Sam]29-sam and [his]29-sam apology . The attack . [Sam]29-sam and [two other unknown men]1137-two other unknown men saving [her]64-simon life . [She]64-simon remembered waking briefly several times in [the Emergency Room]1138-the emergency room , [Simon]64-simon right next to [her]64-simon , holding [her]64-simon hand , murmuring encouraging words while [she]64-simon ... oh God ... had [she]64-simon really thrown up all over [him]1139-him ? Right after the attack , everything had been so intense : the dizziness , the nausea , the blurred vision , the desire to escape back into the darkness and blissful relief of sleep . [Her]64-simon surroundings were dim , the only light illuminating what appeared to be [a hospital room]1140-a hospital room with a small square and narrow overhead light near the door . [Her]64-simon eyes scanned [the room]259-the room . [It]259-the room was set up for double occupancy , but the bed beside [her]64-simon was empty and completely undisturbed . Compared to the way [she]64-simon had felt in [the Emergency Room]1138-the emergency room , the headache [she]64-simon was experiencing seemed like a major improvement . [Her]64-simon stomach was slightly queasy and [she]64-simon had obviously suffered an open wound to [her]64-simon forehead , but [she]64-simon was still alive . [She]64-simon sucked in a deep , tremulous breath , releasing it slowly as a wave of adrenaline washed over [her]64-simon body ; clearly [she]64-simon was experiencing some delayed anxiety from the experience that had happened ... uh ... when ? Crap ... [I]0-i really need to get [my]0-i head together ! Squinting at the clock , [she]64-simon could see that it was four a.m. Nine hours had passed since the terrifying experience that had left [her]64-simon alone in [a hospital room]1140-a hospital room , thanking [the Almighty]1144-the almighty that [she]64-simon was still among [the living]1145-the living . [She]64-simon flinched as [she]64-simon moved [her]64-simon left arm , stretching the tubing of the I.V. inserted in the back of [her]64-simon hand , causing stress at the insertion site . Damn , that hurt . Replacing the limb to its former position , [she]64-simon attempted to cautiously stretch [her]64-simon other arm , finding it trapped , encapsulated inside a large , strong , warm prison . “ [Simon]64-simon , ”[64-simon] [she]64-simon whispered softly , suddenly realizing that [she]64-simon was n’t alone , [her]64-simon eyes landing on the place where [their]1146-their skin touched , finding [his]1147-his fingers entwined with [hers]64-simon , [his]1147-his head resting next to [their]1146-their joined hands , [his]1147-his eyes closed . [Her]64-simon heart contracted as [her]64-simon gaze swept over [him]1147-his , taking in every feature of [his]1147-his beloved , handsome face . [She]64-simon drank in the sight of [him]1147-his , feeling as if it had been forever since [she]64-simon had seen that handsome face . Even in sleep , [he]1147-his looked tense and fierce , the lock of wayward hair that slithered over [his]1147-his forehead the only thing that softened [his]1147-his appearance in slumber . Slowly disentangling [their]1146-their entwined fingers , [she]64-simon stroked [his]1147-his hair back , enjoying the texture of the thick , disheveled strands between [her]64-simon fingers . Had [he]1147-his been [here]115-here all night ? Had [he]1147-his ever left [the hospital]1149-the hospital ? [He]1147-his was dressed in a pair of light blue hospital scrubs , a sure sign that [her]64-simon memory of tossing [her]64-simon cookies down the front of what was probably a very expensive sweater was probably accurate . [I]0-i love [you]1150-you .
